transArray.content: Overall, it’s not bad. It’s right in the courtyard of Porsche Center Haidian.

Thank you very much for sharing your stay. All the hotel staff have worked hard to get your 5 points of satisfaction. From your rating, we can see that we still have room for improvement. We hope you can give us more You have the opportunity to experience our changes when you stay again. I wish you all the best - General Manager Zhang Xiangyun
